title: Setting Up The Winter Chicken Coop Part 2 and Setting Up The Waterer

tasks.task: Setting up roosting poles for chickens and ducks.
subtasks: Determine appropriate spacing and height for the roosting poles.
Choose wooden poles for the roosting structure.
Secure the roosting poles to the roof.

tasks.task: Installing an automatic waterer for the chickens and ducks.
subtasks: Clean and prepare a 55-gallon drum for use as a waterer.
Position the 55-gallon drum with the appropriate spigots for easy access.
Assemble and maintain the automatic water bowl setup.

tasks.task: Preparing the chicken coop for the arrival of new chickens and ducks.
subtasks: Introduce hay and additional bedding materials into the coop.
Position hay bales within the coop for the chickens and ducks to use.

tasks.task: Transferring chickens and ducks into the newly prepared coop.
subtasks: Gradually acclimate the chickens and ducks to their new environment.
Monitor the animals' reactions to the water bowl and roosting poles.

tasks.task: Engaging with the audience through social media and comments.
subtasks: Respond to viewers' suggestions and ideas for future videos.
Encourage viewers to follow the farm's social media accounts for updates.
